import React, {Component} from 'react' import countryList from 'react-select-country-list' export default class FormCheckout extends Component{ state={ username : '', email: '', passowrd: '', confirmPassword: '', country:'' } CountrySelector() { const [value, setValue] = useState('') const options = useMemo(() => countryList().getData(), []) const changeHandler = value => { setValue(value) } } handleChange=(e)=>{ this.setState({ [e.target.id]:e.target.value },()=>{ console.log(this.state); }) } render(){ return (

Express Check out

Payer Info

Please make sure you have filled the required information

) } }
